name: Olav: the story of one boy
storyline: Olav is the ordinary guy living according to the standard scenario the house-work-house. He since the early childhood understood - justice in this world should not worth waiting for! If you were betrayed by the dearest people , who in this world can be trusted. For this reason Olav don't get involved with people, but in secret dreams to find a soul mate. And all his life changes with the advent of the new neighbor - Lily!
summary: Hello, friend, you know what it's like to live… That would be the subject of «the story of one boy»
